title: Internet and Intranet Applications with PowerBuilder 6
text: If you're a PowerBuilder programmer, Internet and Intranet Applications with PowerBuilder 6 is your ticket to learning Web.PB and related technologies. The book covers everything you need to know to build web browser and server programs with the PowerBuilder 6 Internet Toolkit. Also covered is how to write winsock programs with PB, and Distributed PB is covered to the extent necessary to learn Web.PB.
